sentences.sContent: The length of time spent exercising depends on the sport you are training for.
sentences.sCn: 锻炼时间长短取决于训练的体育项目。

sentences.sContent: He depended on his writing for his income.

synos.tran: 依赖，依靠；取决于；相信，信赖

words.tran: 依靠的；从属的；取决于…的
可靠的，可信赖的；可信任的

remMethod.val: de(在…之下) + pend(悬挂) → 悬挂于之下 → 依靠， 依赖

trans.tranOther: If you depend on someone or something, you need them in order to be able to survive physically, financially, or emotionally
